a.title: Adult and Student Mental Health Resources

img.title: Adult and Student Mental Health Resources

span.style: color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: By the end of the 2019-2020 school year, our district WILL raise awareness for the Newcomerstown community and provide resources on the following topics in concurrence with the results of 2018-2019 Newcomerstown School District Parent Survey: Social Media/Cyberbullying, Mental Health/Mental Well-Being, Substance Abuse (Vaping, Opioids, Alcohol, and other illegal drugs).

span.style: color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;font-size:16px;font-family:Georgia

p.span: By the end of the 2019-2020 school year, EVERY student enrolled in our district will receive at least two positive, personal, and individualized contacts home from a staff member.

strong.span: Exempted Village School District is asking for sealed a proposal for furnishing up tofournew 72-passenger conventional school busesand a separate proposal for one77-passenger conventional school

.Bids will be received in care of the Ohio School Boards Association, 8050 N. High Street, Suite 100, Columbus Ohio 43235-6481, until 12:00 noon E.S.T.,April 16,2020,and will be opened and read aloud at that time. Instructions to bidders and specifications for equipment may be obtained from the Ohio School Boards Association at
